speech:
•	Practice good Crop rotation for effective long term control.
•	ensure an early spray of RODAZIM 12.5ml/20ltrs one week after emergence for less resistant variants such as the Shangi.
•	follow this with a spray of STAGE at 10-15ml/20Ltr and repeat after 1 week to protect the crop from fungal infections later. 
•	Add 30ml/20ltr HARMONY to every spray of RODAZIM and STAGE to increase  the effectiveness of the fungicide.
